title: I am unable to setup an old Google Pixel phone after factory reset. How do I fix this?
content:
I am attempting to setup an old Pixel phone for my sister. I have performed a factory reset through the bootloader screen since I couldn't remember the PIN I used to unlock it.

Now, when I try to setup the phone I'm unable to use my gmail account, which I used to setup the phone when I bought it, nor am I able to use my sister's gmail account. When I successfully authenticate with either of the accounts, I get the error "Please sign in using one of the owner's accounts for this device". How can I overcome this error?

Thanks in advance for any help.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
